meanings.definition: A person who refuses to cooperate.
meanings.sent1: The noncooperationist did not want to work with the team.
meanings.sent2: The noncooperationist stood alone, unwilling to join the group project.
meanings.sent3: The noncooperationist decided to sit out of the group activity and read a book instead.
meanings.sent4: Her stubbornness made her a noncooperationist in the eyes of her classmates.
meanings.sent5: The noncooperationist's determination to work independently was admirable.

meanings.sent1: The noncooperationist's lack of teamwork affected the whole group.
meanings.sent2: The meeting was unproductive due to the noncooperationist's attitude.
meanings.sent3: The noncooperationist's refusal to share the toys led to a playful argument.
meanings.sent4: His noncooperationist behavior created a rift between him and his friends.
meanings.sent5: The noncooperationist's resistance to collaboration hindered the project's progress.
